news_header: Wärtsilä reports improved sales and operating results for July-September.
news_text: Wärtsilä's sales and net sales showed improvement, with a 4% increase in comparable operating results to EUR 177 million and an 18% rise in net sales to EUR 1.7 billion for the July-September period. The company anticipates better demand over the next 12 months, despite increased geopolitical risks in recent months, according to CEO Håkan Agnevall.
